# PED::SET_PED_ENABLE_WEAPON_BLOCKING

## Summary
Allows this non-player ped to use weapon blocked behavior.  Help prevent wall penetration!

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** enableWeaponBlocking
